analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its performance.
insights: The homepage has the longest load time (614 ms) among the passed tests. Consider optimizing images, minifying CSS and JavaScript, and leveraging browser caching to reduce the load time.
The blog page has a high First Contentful Paint (FCP) time (290 ms), which may impact user experience. Investigate the cause of this delay and optimize the page accordingly.
The pricing page has the best performance, with the lowest load time (277.89 ms) and TTFB (40.1 ms). Use this page as a benchmark for optimizing other pages on the website.
